response.overview: A short film about a group of friends, who are in quarantine and can only communicate via Zoom.  Heather(Erica Duke) is a good friend to Jess(Karley Rene) who has just been dumped by her boyfriend, Nathan(Edward Brence).  Heather tries to keep her excitement down about meeting a new guy to Jess but eventually it comes out and Jess is happy for her.  Another friend, Michelle(Kellyrose Marry) tries to cause trouble between Heather and Jess as she discovers a secret that could ruin their friendship.
response.tagline: Stuck in quarantine, 3 friends try to stay connected online while going through a major hardship.
response.title: The Parting
